notes: Potassium nitrate is a primary oxidizer widely used in black powder and pyrotechnic formulations; its own flame color is a pale lilac/violet and often masked by other colorants.

procurement_sources.acquisition_restrictions: oxidizer; hazmat and shipping restrictions apply in some regions
procurement_sources.notes: Widely used oxidizer for black powder and pyrotechnic compositions; 1 lb and bulk sizes.

procurement_sources.acquisition_restrictions: oxidizer; subject to typical fireworks chemical shipping rules
procurement_sources.notes: Pyrotechnic-focused supplier with milled and technical grade potassium nitrate.

procurement_sources.acquisition_restrictions: oxidizer; U.S. regulations on oxidizers apply; may have weight limits per shipment
procurement_sources.notes: Supplier specializing in high-purity potassium nitrate for black powder and pyrotechnics.
